biologiis maswavleblad, xolo meri axraxaZe _ 1960 wlidan fizkulturis


maswavleblad. skolis gimna

vadiT, xolo 1995 wlis 21 agvistos, ukve gimnaziis xelmZRvanelobam aiZula

erTi wliT. amis Semdeg xelSekrulebebi aRar ganaxlebula, Tumca mosarCeleebs


yovelwliurad awerinebdnen gancxadebebs samuSaoze miRebis Sesaxeb.
